html:
3.21.24  7:44 pm   Why is paper so amazing

      because of how it looks from the side

3.21.24  7:03 pm   I'm reluctant to ask you questions about music because from what I've seen, it comes naturally to you and most of the time people have trouble explaining what they do naturally. Anyways, how does walking work?

      you climb the ground forward

3.21.24  6:53 pm   can you switch the website font to helvetica neue

      no, but there is no font on the website. therefore, if you crave helvetica neue as much as you say you do, then you should have already set that as your default web browsing font, and therefore would already be seeing it here

3.21.24  6:16 pm   do you believe in ghosts? 

      almost

3.21.24  6:05 pm   why do we procrastinate?

      because you are not ready

3.21.24  6:04 pm   do you like worms and do you like to worm and do you like two worms

      not so much

3.21.24  5:55 pm   You tryna recreate that scene from titanic? You can pick which one ;)

      i would not

3.21.24  5:35 pm   Are all low grades bad?

      i doubt it

3.21.24  4:53 pm   how do i finish things

      how about starting something twice

3.21.24  4:17 pm   where do sharks get their bigness

      from slightly smaller sharks

3.21.24  3:57 pm   hey Bill, have you ever had a job while making music? if so, did you like it? did you study for it? was it worth it? i love music. listening to it, jamming, playing songs with my friends and singing, improvising, sort of composing. i know a lot of theory,  but i am kinda scared to put it in use. I never really completed anything, because i never know what kind of medium do i want it to be in the end. has that ever happened to you? i have a lot of unfinished stuff laying around and i don't know where should i take them. I don't think i can do all of the stuff i like about music at the same time or can i? i never really found a passion as big as my passion for music, so i don't know if i should study to get that 'safe bet job'. got any advice for me?

      no. you are doing great

3.21.24  2:29 pm   any tips on how to stop the boogyman?

      no. the boogyperson shall continue

3.21.24  2:12 pm   why does my school lunch suck

      to inspire you to make better lunches

3.21.24  1:31 pm   hey bill does it feel weird when people start questions with hey bill

      not really

3.21.24  10:44 am   what do you think about the concept of time?

      here we are

3.21.24  10:32 am   i couldn't think of any questions to ask you. any ideas?

      sure. how about going to the direct center of outer space

3.21.24  8:59 am   what do you think cats would say if they could talk

      meow

3.21.24  1:32 am   how do you un-give up on something?

      explain it to someone who doesn't know anything about it

3.20.24  11:52 pm   Do you like tetris?

      i respect tetris

3.20.24  11:18 pm   hear me out, what if the gravity source was not in the same direction as the ground

      now you're getting somewhere

3.20.24  11:04 pm   I'm about to graduate from college and start my career in corporate hell. What should I do with my life

      how about inventing the next big thing

3.20.24  8:40 pm   Have you had any supernatural experiences?

      now that i think about it, i really don't understand what the word supernatural is supposed to mean

3.20.24  8:03 pm   how has 2024 been treating you so far

      ok

3.20.24  7:40 pm   there's an attractive person in one of my classes that i want to introduce myself to. every time i see them they're with their friends and that seems like it would be awkward in a bad way. do you have any advice for someone in my situation?

      it might be an interesting thought exercise for you to imagine this situation from the other person's perspective: someone has a strong desire to talk to you, based only on the way you look

3.20.24  7:18 pm   if you had a 10000 year lifespan, would you be an engineer for part of it?

      most of it probably

3.20.24  6:25 pm   Favorite number?

      1 or 2

3.20.24  6:15 pm   How do you consistently make amazing videos?

      that's impossible

3.20.24  5:41 pm   Which has more power, love or fear?

      i'm not sure

3.20.24  4:47 pm   Would you describe your songs as abstract?

     abstract is one of the elements i may use, another one being of course concrete. those 2 elements supplement each other nicely i find

     What other genres could you describe them as?

     for me the game works differently: i do the not-describing. i make the thing. i actually get extra points for making it harder to describe

3.20.24  4:38 pm   how do i get motivation to do things

      what has motivated you to want to want to do those things

3.20.24  4:10 pm   why do i forget things when i walk into another room?

      because you are distracted by all the new things in that room

3.20.24  2:59 pm   What is your ideal gaming setup?

      the ground, and a gravity source

3.20.24  2:41 pm   what time do you sleep bill?

      typically at the same time as the previous day, whatever that may have been

3.20.24  2:19 pm   what's your signature dance move in a hardcore mosh pit? 

      not being there

3.20.24  2:01 pm   How much of your vibe is intentional

      in most cases, the answer to this would be 50%

3.20.24  1:17 pm   why am i failing at everything, even simple things

      why do you think you are

3.20.24  12:27 pm   what is the point of war?

      competition over space, resources, and influence. in case we are all not each other already

3.20.24  12:18 pm   How do I become more confident?

      how about climbing a couple of walls

3.20.24  11:03 am   should I congratulate my uncle on his bday? I don't reeeaally like him ... but I congratulated my aunt for her bday through my cousin and she has the same bday as my uncle ( her brother ).

      it's worth noting that when people get older, they might not like to be reminded of their birthday. i'm not saying your aunt/uncle are old, but they might be older than you are

3.20.24  10:58 am   Have you ever been recognized by fans in public? If so did they ask for your autograph or a picture?

      i ask them for autographs and pictures. i collect autographs and pictures of strangers, mostly just to be polite, but also for the purpose of selling them to other strangers

3.20.24  9:46 am   what's the volatility index at right now?

      it keeps changing

3.20.24  9:34 am   I crossed the line. What do i do

      do it again! this is fun

3.20.24  7:58 am   What program should I use to learn MIDI composition

      that's none of my business

3.20.24  7:41 am   Do you play any sports?

      let me think

3.20.24  7:33 am   what genre of music are your songs inspired by?

      none. i deliberately sabatoged my understanding of the genre boundaries. i didn't trust them anyway. in the long run this was the right decision, because they tend to become even less reliable over time

3.20.24  4:16 am   are we gonna go to mars

      i don't see why not

3.19.24  11:22 pm   opinion on australia

      don't forget about tasmania

3.19.24  11:00 pm   Should I quit my day job to focus on music?

      if you think you can

3.19.24  9:14 pm   Why does out to lunch end with a title card?

      because the titular moment occurs at the end. it makes sense there

3.19.24  8:19 pm   thoughts on uppercase letters?

      when in rome
